snippet.title: Els chases leader Fraser in Korea; Weather hits New Orleans event
snippet.description:
* South Africa veteran Ernie Els fired a three-under-par 69 to lurk just two shots behind leader Marcus Fraser at the weather-affected Ballantine's Championship in South Korea on Saturday.
http://www.cnn.com/2010/SPORT/golf/04/24/golf.els.fraser.ballantines.korea/index.html

snippet.title: Food shortage not hurting North Korean government
snippet.description:
* By contrast, North Koreans in much of the country are surviving on about a total of 200 grams of rice or corn per day. You could hold that amount of food by cupping your hands together.
http://www.cnn.com/WORLD/9609/17/nkorea.food.politics/index.html

snippet.title: Grenades and gravy – cooking in the Korean War
snippet.description:
* For most veterans of the Korean War, "SOS" has nothing to do with saving a ship. I've heard the stories...
http://eatocracy.cnn.com/2011/11/11/grenades-and-gravy-cooking-in-the-korean-war/

snippet.title: 2 dead, many unaccounted as rescuers scramble to sinking South Korean ship
snippet.description:
* Rescue boats and helicopters scrambled to pluck passengers, most of them high school students, from a ferry as it listed and slowly sank off the southwest coast of South Korea on Wednesday.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/15/world/asia/south-korea-sinking-ship-students/index.html

snippet.title: Seaborne cranes called in as relatives fear end to ferry rescue operation
snippet.description:
* With difficult weather conditions conspiring against rescue efforts and frustrated, angry relatives accosting officials at Jindo port, chances of finding survivors from the Sewol ferry that unexpectedly sank Wednesday are decreasing with each passing hour.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/18/world/asia/south-korea-ferry-crane/index.html

snippet.title: Murky waters cloud the horror facing ferry rescue divers
snippet.description:
* Two large inflatables mark the spot where the Sewol ferry sank on Wednesday, taking with it hundreds of passengers.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/20/world/asia/south-korea-dive-site-hancocks/index.html

snippet.title: Heavy rain halts RBC Heritage with K.J. Choi in lead
snippet.description:
* Heavy rain halted play on the second day of the RBC Heritage in South Carolina on Friday.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/18/sport/golf/rbc-invitational-day-two-rain/index.html

snippet.title: A runner's view of the world's most closed society
snippet.description:
* The chance to run a marathon through the capital city of the world's most mysterious country was too good an opportunity to pass up.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/16/travel/pyongyang-marathon/index.html

snippet.title: Does God have a prayer in Hollywood?
snippet.description:
* By Daniel Burke, CNN Belief Blog Co-Editor Los Angeles (CNN) – Forgive Darren Aronofsky if he’s begun to identify with the title character of his new film, “Noah.” Like the infamous ark-maker, the 45-year-old director has weathered a Bible-sized storm...
http://religion.blogs.cnn.com/2014/03/28/does-god-have-a-prayer-in-hollywood/
